name: HFBoards Dark Theme
description:
Changing HF from eye melting white, to eye-saving dark.

There is a centered option, so there is less wasted space in the messages. Enabled by default. Can be disabled by the advanced options below!
additional_info:
2018-05-10:
updated to apply style to parts of site that were new or changed
updated logos

2017-12-04:
changed link colors again after default HF changes
changed hover over colors on main forum list

2017-12-01:
changed link font color

2017-11-09:
fixed black font
fixed other minor defects

2017-10-15:
fixed various parts of the site

2017-10-06:
added a centered option (on by default), can be turned off (click advanced styles on this page!)

2017-10-04:
Updated theme to match some changes hf made on their end.
Fixed quick reply colors
Fixed new reply notification colors
Fixed thread page links
Fixed polls
Fixed search

2017-09-29:
Based on blazingblueant's theme:

https://userstyles.org/styles/148793/bba-hfboards

Changes from BBA's:
Dark home page
Logos for non-team subforums
Removed out of place white elements
Fixed alert and messaging buttons

style_setting_options.label: On
